latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Economics of Upland Rice Production in Indonesia

dsDescriptionValue.value: The objective of the study is to review government policies on upland rice, evaluate the relationship between upland rice activities and poverty level, and identify scenarios to improve the role of upland areas in rice production in Indonesia.

keywordValue.value: Demographic, Production Input, Consumption and Expenditures, Demographics, Input and Cost of rice production,Consumption, Landholdings, Landuse, Livestocks, Income, input and cost, rice production, Land Holding, Income, Establishment, Rice varieties

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 220;
